content:
I'm happy to help you with that!

The cost of a monthly bus pass varies depending on the city and transit agency you're in. Could you please tell me what city or region you're in? That way, I can provide you with more specific information on the cost and where to buy a monthly pass.

Regarding your creative commuting experience, I'm impressed you had to think outside the box! $20 for an Uber ride can add up quickly, so I understand why you're looking into more affordable options like a monthly bus pass.

Let me know your location, and I'll do my best to assist you with the cost and purchasing information for a monthly bus pass.
